label: Structure Prediction
description: Predict protein 3D structures from amino acid sequences using AI-based models

defaultInputs.name: Protein List
defaultInputs.description: List of proteins with FASTA sequences
defaultInputs.tooltip: Input table of proteins with names and FASTA sequences for structure prediction.

defaultOutputs.name: Protein name
defaultOutputs.tooltip: Name or identifier of the protein (e.g., 'TAS1R2').

defaultOutputs.name: Fasta
defaultOutputs.tooltip: FASTA sequence of the protein including header and amino acid sequence.

defaultOutputs.name: pTM
defaultOutputs.tooltip: Predicted Template Modeling score (0-1), indicating the confidence in the predicted structure. Higher values indicate better confidence (e.g. 0.79).

defaultOutputs.name: Druggability
defaultOutputs.tooltip: Druggability score (0-1) indicating the potential of the protein as a drug target. Higher values indicate better druggability.

configSchema.label: Protein List (Paste)
configSchema.tooltip: Paste protein names and FASTA sequences. Format: >ProteinName followed by sequence on next lines, or use comma-separated format.

configSchema.label: Upload Protein File
configSchema.tooltip: Upload a FASTA file or CSV containing protein names and sequences. Required: protein identifier and FASTA sequence.

configSchema.label: Prediction Method
configSchema.tooltip: Select the protein structure prediction method. AlphaFold is recommended for highest accuracy.

configSchema.label: Include Confidence Scores
configSchema.tooltip: Include pTM and other confidence metrics in the output.

configSchema.label: Calculate Druggability
configSchema.tooltip: Calculate druggability scores for predicted structures.
